## PBInsideFunctionScope.$do() method

Creates a 'do..while' statement

**Signature:**

```typescript
$do(body: (this: PBDoWhileScope) => void): PBDoWhileScope;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  body | (this: [PBDoWhileScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbdowhilescope.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | Generator function for the scope that inside the do..while statment |

**Returns:**

[PBDoWhileScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbdowhilescope.md)
